bio: I'm Dani - Head of Growth from TAG Ventures.
contributionDescription: I'm Dani from the TAG Community. We are a community that shares information about leading crypto projects in Vietnam. We highly appreciate OP and have been sharing the project since the early days. We expect OP to be one of the projects that will explode in the near future. Below are some of our posts about the project.

contributionLinks.description: Airdrop Optimism Free Mint Ether’s Phoenix NFT
Tutorial Testnet Optimism Governance Portal Optimism

impactDescription:
ptimism Collective is a large-scale experiment in "digital democracy governance" designed to foster the rapid and sustainable development of the decentralized ecosystem on Optimism.

Optimism Collective will be managed by the Optimism Foundation organization.

Optimism Collective comprises communities, projects, and citizens (referred to as citizens – meaning users), operating based on a mutually beneficial covenant, with the underlying principle being "impact = profit." This means that the more active and engaged we are, the greater the benefits we receive from the ecosystem.
We highly appreciate OP and have been sharing the project since the early days in the OP ecosystem.
Below are some of our posts about the project.
pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged because it violates rule 1, promises of future impact ("We expect OP to be one of the projects that will explode in the near future").
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, it should be categorized as "PROJECT" because the applicant is representing TAG Ventures, a community sharing information about crypto projects.
